summary: This is basically just a mod for fun, adds in "the Countess" Elizabeth from AHS: Hotel to the Blue Palace in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Countess Elizabeth Follower

[img]https://s26.postimg.org/hnhjzymo9/Countess_Comparisons.jpg[/img][/size][/color][/font]



[size=3][color=#ffff00]This is my (failed) attempt at adding the Countess Elizabeth from AHS Hotel to the Blue Palace in Solitude. This is really just for fun and is not to be taken all that seriously. Elizabeth uses vampire attacks and one-handed melee in combat. 

She comes equipped with an ebony dagger and radiant vampire armor.

[/color][/size][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font] 
[*][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][size=3][color=#ffff00]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. 


[/color][/size][font=Arial][color=#ff0000][size=4]*Final Note: You [u]NEED[/u] to download and activate both KS Hair Renewal and The Eyes of Beauty if you plan to use this mod, otherwise my mod will not work as intended.[/size][/color][/font]
author: AedanStarfang
